lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Dan Reynolds/Wayne Sermon/Ben McKee/Daniel Platzman
[00:01.000] 作曲 : Dan Reynolds/Wayne Sermon/Ben McKee/Daniel Platzman
[00:08.780]Am I out of touch?
[00:10.460]Am I out of my place?
[00:12.610]When I keep saying that I'm looking for an empty space
[00:16.650]Oh I'm wishing you're here
[00:18.610]But I'm wishing you're gone
[00:20.680]I can't have you and I'm only gonna do you wrong
[00:24.570]Oh I'm gonna mess this up
[00:26.480]Oh this is just my luck
[00:28.700]Over and over and over again
[00:32.860]In the meantime we let it go
[00:34.250]At the road side that we used to know
[00:36.190]We can let this drift away
[00:38.260]Oh We let this drift away
[00:40.200]And there's always time to change your mind
[00:42.210]Oh there's always time to change your mind
[00:44.030]Oh there's always time to change your mind
[00:46.140]Oh  love Can you hear me
[01:04.860]I'm sorry for everything oh everything I've done
[01:08.200]From the second that I was born i think I had a loaded gun
[01:12.080]And then I shot shot shot a hole through everything I love
[01:16.310]Oh I shot shot shot a hole through every single thing that I loved
[01:36.780]Am I out of luck
[01:38.500]Am I waiting to break
[01:40.550]When I keep saying that I'm looking for a way to escape
[01:44.500]Oh I m wishing I had what I'd taken for granted
[01:48.700]I can't have you and I'm only gonna do you wrong
[01:52.380]Oh I'm gonna mess this up
[01:54.300]Oh this is just my luck over and over and over again
[02:00.430]In the meantime we let it go
[02:01.950]At the road side that we used to know
[02:03.880]We can let this drift away
[02:05.910]Oh We let this drift away
[02:07.940]And there's always time to change your mind
[02:09.990]Oh there's always time to change your mind
[02:11.880]Oh there's always time to change your mind
[02:13.930]Oh love can you hear me
[02:32.270]I'm sorry for everything oh everything I've done
[02:35.970]From the second that I was born it seems I had a loaded gun
[02:39.520]And then I shot shot shot a hole through everything I love
[02:43.590]Oh I shot shot shot a hole through every single thing that I loved
tlyric:
[00:08.780]我会不会在你眼中显得难以接近？
[00:10.460]我会不会在你眼中显得格格不入？
[00:12.610]当我一直表现的拒人于千里之外。
[00:16.650]我一边希望你能够与我形影不离，
[00:18.610]一边却希望你能够彻底置身事外。
[00:20.680]我不敢与你相拥，因为这只会让你遍体鳞伤。
[00:24.570]最后我又会把这一切弄糟，
[00:26.480]这就是我的宿命，
[00:28.700]一次又一次循环往复。
[00:32.860]这一次我们干脆让爱随缘。
[00:34.250]伫立在那条我们相熟相知的路边，
[00:36.190]我们可以让以前的对错随风而逝，
[00:38.260]我们可以让过去的是非顺水而去。
[00:40.200]我们随时都可以冰释前嫌，
[00:42.210]我们随时都可以和好如初，
[00:44.030]我会一生守候你回心转意，
[00:46.140]哦，我的挚爱，你知道吗？
[01:04.860]对于以前的所作所为我都倍感歉意。
[01:08.200]我一生下来就似乎拿着把上膛的枪，
[01:12.080]然后不断开枪破坏我所心爱的东西，
[01:16.310]将每一块曾珍惜的美好都打成粉碎。
[01:36.780]是不是仅有的好运已被我消耗殆尽？
[01:38.500]是不是崩溃的深渊已离我近在咫尺？
[01:40.550]当我脑海中仅存着消极逃避的念头。
[01:44.500]直到失去曾习以为常的事物后我才倍感珍惜，
[01:48.700]我不敢与你相拥，因为这只会使你遍体鳞伤。
[01:52.380]最后我又会把这一切弄糟，
[01:54.300]宿命一次又一次循环往复。
[02:00.430]这一次我们干脆让爱随缘。
[02:01.950]伫立在那条我们相熟相知的路边，
[02:03.880]我们可以让以前的对错随风而逝，
[02:05.910]我们可以让过去的是非顺水而去。
[02:07.940]我们随时都可以冰释前嫌，
[02:09.990]我们随时都可以和好如初，
[02:11.880]我会一生守候你回心转意，
[02:13.930]哦，我的挚爱，你知道吗？
[02:32.270]对于以前的所作所为我都倍感歉意，
[02:35.970]我一生下来就似乎拿着把上膛的枪，
[02:39.520]然后不断开枪破坏我所心爱的东西，
[02:43.590]将每一块曾珍惜的美好都打成粉碎。
